text: Thank you, I'll look into this!

Hi everyone, I had a question regarding HUBDB.

I want to see if anyone has come across any issues converting a text column to rich text?

I'm 99% sure there isn't any issues, as I tried it in a sandbox account, but I have a 1% feeling that there might be something down the line when it comes to pulling in data async via their v3 api and or how HubSpot handles these rich text columns. i.e. caching, invalidating cache after updates. etc

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UK0WqP7jeDA>

We are currently watching Jon code up the new dev site
This is a great question for the <#C05R599UA12|ui-extensions> channel

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
Hi Guys - I’m tried to update the logo in a cloned System Password template for another domain but it’s keep pulling the main site logo. Any help is appreciated.
Anyone know if HubSpot has published an article that explains how they decide how email lists are split up for an A/B test?
